name: Akan Music
description: Music of the Akan people of Ghana and CÃ´te d'Ivoire, including a variety of traditional and neo-traditional styles which are based on some of the oldest traditions in West Africa.

children.name: Kete
children.description: Traditional percussive style played at special occasions in the courts of high ranking Asante chieftains.

children.name: Zoblazo
children.description: Ivorian dance music combining traditional instruments and synthesizers that emerged in the late 1980s.
